item.title: CO-CST tangling analysis
item.description: Overall task tangling â“ CST is much more feedback driven than CO. Does this show up as M1 dynamics being less apparently autonomous? That is, is neural tangling higher in CST than CO? âœ”ï¸ Tangling doesn’t really appear to be much higher in CST than CO, suggesting that the feedback may be “predictable” most of the time. ğŸ’¬ Does tangling depend on the amount of data you use to check it?
